sentences.sContent: I was using a dictaphone to record the conversation.
sentences.sContent_eng: I was using a dictaphone to record the conversation.
sentences.sCn: 我用的是口述录音机来记录对话。

synos.tran: 录音机；口授留声机；录音电话机

remMethod.val: dict(a)(说) + phone(电话) → 录音电话机

trans.tranOther: a tape recorder designed for recording dictation and later reproducing it for typing
